markdownRemark.html:
Introduction

"Of all the variables affecting communications, the one

factor that the individual operator has the most control over is the antenna and its use."

The US Military Field Antenna Handbook (1984) is a fantastic resource from a Hacker News post for learning about the complicated topic of antennas in a simple and straightforward manner.

I highly recommend you decide to read the text, which can be found Here
